column1: Kata Robata////Great place to eat quality sashimi. Be prepared to spend some money though. Averaging about 6-8$ for 2 pieces of sashimi. Not steak cuts either. Great atmosphere
column2: although it feels like it has not had its proper maintenance. The quality of the seafood has not let us down. You can tell how fresh the fish is by having some Toro
column4: as well as some Uni. All should not be too cold
column6: and all should not need a ton of soy sauce nor wasabi.
